title: The influence of prompt engineering on large language models for protein–protein interaction identification in biomedical literature
details: YC Chang, MS Huang, YH Huang, YH Lin - Scientific Reports, 2025
abstract: Identifying protein–protein interactions (PPIs) is a foundational task in biomedical natural language processing. While specialized models have been developed, the potential of general-domain large language models (LLMs) in PPI extraction …
